creditline: Gift of various donors, by exchange
description: head of a woman, open on top with blue glaze at interior; gold stripe down center of face; one orange eye and one green eye; white and green mottled base
image_copyright: Â©Estate Robert Arneson %2F Copyright VAGA%2C New York%2C NY
signed: \"Arneson/1988\", incised, PL side, at back of neck
text: Robert Arneson's portrait busts, though referencing a longstanding artistic tradition, embody his identification with the California "Funk" movement--less a style than an attitude. For Viola with Gold he employed vivid glazes and facial expressions that recalled both pop culture and Pop Art.
title: Viola with Gold
